main event: Multiple reports of various lights and objects were observed over Asheville, North Carolina on May 9, 1964.
interesting points: The objects were reported by two students who saw a U.F.O. maneuvering above a water tower., Sketches were included that depicted the U.F.O.'s movements., A glowing white object was observed through a telescope days prior, shooting straight up and vanishing., Multiple reports were made by students, indicating a consistent observation of U.F.O.s over several days., The U.S. Air Force indicated the sightings were likely misinterpretations of conventional objects and planets.
witness description: students at Asheville School for Boys
